name: Heads N Tails: Mythical Pet Shop
name_original: Heads N Tails: Mythical Pet Shop
description:
Welcome to Heads ‘n’ Tails Mythical Pet Shop!

Care for a range of unique fantasy pets, serve customers and earn reputation, over 2 elemental levels using a drag and drop system, before converting your points into positions on the leaderboard. 

Heads ‘n’ Tails Mythical Pet Shop is available on PC platforms, created by Milksop Games for Tranzfuser 2019 and was showcased at EGX 2019!!

Follow our Twitter: @milksopgames
